name: DOGS of the DARK
description:
DOGS of the DARK is a role-playing game, or rpg, that pulls inspirations from retro rpgs from the 90's and the quirky ones from the 2000's. It features a full 5+ chapter campaign filled with dumb jokes, strange characters, and retro pixel art graphics akin to 8-Bit or 16-Bit games.

Addie Mayweather, or just Addie, has been brought to another world known as THE DARK by one of its princes, Dexter. He needs Addie's assistance in reaching the capital of a kingdom he was exiled from in order to reclaim his throne as king.

What does the game have in it, I'm glad you asked, it contains.

  • Battles similar to 2000's indie RPGs, with inspiration from Final Fantasy, Pokemon, and Deltarune.
  • 5 Chapters, with hours of scenery, characters, dialouge and button puzzles.
  • Multiple Endings
  • Tons of charm and amateurish goodness
  • minecarts r cool BD

Thanks for reading through this and maybe grabbing the game, if so thanks.

See ya ;)
